scripts.dist:copy:firefox: shx mkdir -p dist/firefox/run-in-terminal && cpy "src" "pages" "icons" "README.md" "package.json" "!**/*.map" "!**/*.entry.*" dist/firefox/run-in-terminal --parents && cpy manifest-firefox.json dist/firefox/run-in-terminal --rename=manifest.json
scripts.dist:copy:chrome: shx mkdir -p dist/chrome/run-in-terminal && cpy "src" "pages" "icons" "README.md" "package.json" "!**/*.map" "!**/*.entry.*" dist/firefox/run-in-terminal --parents && cpy manifest-chrome.json dist/chrome/run-in-terminal --rename=manifest.json
scripts.release:firefox: npm run dist:clean:firefox && npm run build && npm run dist:copy:firefox && npm run pack:firefox
scripts.release:chrome: npm run dist:clean:chrome && npm run build && npm run dist:copy:chrome && npm run pack:chrome
scripts.release:native: npm run dist:clean:native && npm run dist:copy:native && npm run pack:native
scripts.release:all: npm run release:firefox && npm run release:chrome && npm run release:native
